Parameters: The connected @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient_E@ to service the call.
clearDefaultAccount(com.google.android.g.Description: Removes the default account set in Google Play services for your app. Subsequent calls to @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#connect_E@ will return a resolution intent that will let the user select a different account. If the user chooses the same account, no consent will be required since access to the app is not revoked. Users should also be given the option to revoke access with @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#Account#revokeAccessAndDisconnect_E@. Required API: @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#Plus#API_E@

Returns: the PendingResult for notification and access to the result when it's available.
Parameters: The connected @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient_E@ to service the call.
revokeAccessAndDisconnect(com.google.and.Description: Revokes access given to the current application. Required API: @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#Plus#API_E@

Returns: The account name. If the user has not selected an account, null is returned.
Parameters: The connected @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient_E@ to service the call.
Throws: If your app doesn't have the @B_android#Manifest#permission#GET_ACCOUNTS_E@ permission.
getAccountName(com.google.android.gms.co.Description: Gets the account name resolved by Google Play services. The permission <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS" /> must be declared in your AndroidManifest.xml to use this method. Required API: @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#Plus#API_E@

ClassDesc: The main entry point for Google+ account management. To use these features, you should add the @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#Plus#API_E@ to your @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#Builder_E@.
